description: Error message displayed underneath the text field when an item title settings cannot be saved.
defaultMessage: Could not update the title. Please try again and contact the support if the error persists

description: Header for a menu containing content options for item title
Label for a menu item that selects Custom Title as the title field for an item.
Label for a menu item that selects Pinned Media ID as the title field for an item.
Label for a menu item that selects Claim Title as the title field for an item.
Helper text displayed under the Claim Title option for an item title when the item has no claim.
Label for a menu item that selects Fact-Check Title as the title field for an item.
Helper text displayed under the Fact-Check Title option for an item title when the item has no fact-check.
